question: By what percentage the Indian Economy has contracted in Q1 of 2020-21, compared to the same quarter of 2019-20?
explanation:
Indian Economy has contracted by 23.9% in the Q1 of FY 2020-21 compared to the same quarter of previous FY. This is supposed to be the worst performance since quarterly measurement began in 1996.
The prime reason for economic slowdown and contraction is the COVID 19 pandemic and the nationwide lockdown that followed it.
